channel.title: CVE Feed for UNIMO Technology Co., Ltd -- UNIMO Technology digital video recorders UDR-JA1004/JA1008/JA1016 and UDR-JA1016
channel.description: The latest CVEs for UNIMO Technology Co., Ltd -- UNIMO Technology digital video recorders UDR-JA1004/JA1008/JA1016 and UDR-JA1016

item.title: CVE-2022-35733|2024-08-03T09:44:21.661Z -- unimo%20technology%20co.%2C%20ltd -- unimo%20technology%20digital%20video%20recorders%20udr-ja1004%2Fja1008%2Fja1016%20and%20udr-ja1016
item.description: Missing authentication for critical function vulnerability in UNIMO Technology digital video recorders (UDR-JA1004/JA1008/JA1016 firmware versions v1.0.20.13 and earlier, and UDR-JA1016 firmware versions v2.0.20.13 and earlier) allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command by sending a specially crafted request to the affected device web interface.
